name: RobustEvents
description: A cog for managing and scheduling events with notifications and role creation.
author: CatCogs
end_user_data_statement: This cog stores event data in a configuration database but does not store personal user data persistently.
install_msg: Thank you for installing RobustEvents. Use `[p]eventcreate` to create a new event and `[p]eventlist` to view scheduled events.
